How to Play

The Fifteen Puzzle is a sliding tile game that consists of a 4x4 grid with 15 numbered tiles and one empty space. The goal is to rearrange the tiles in ascending numerical order, starting from 1 in the top-left corner and leaving the empty space in the bottom-right corner.

  • Click a tile adjacent to the empty space to move it into the empty space.
  • Continue sliding tiles until all are in the correct order.
  • Use the "Shuffle" button to randomize the tiles and start a new game.
  • The "Solve Puzzle" button will return the tiles to their original order.
  • Choose a background for the tiles using the dropdown menu.

Can you solve the puzzle in the fewest moves and shortest time possible? Good luck!
